name: zombie zone (maksilazo)
description:
In this game you have to kill zombies to earn points and set high scores with those points. If a zombie touches you, your HP bar starts to decrease. If this is repeated 4 times you will lose. Use the arrow key to walk. Click 'spaces' to shoot. I created this game in 2 hours and 59.

follow me on scratch-https://scratch.mit.edu/users/maksi0907/

zombie link-https://opengameart.org/content/animated-top-down-zombie

player link-https://opengameart.org/content/animated-top-down-survivor-player

this game on scratch-https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/632907087
